an8.44:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
an8.44:1.2: Atha kho vasettho upasako yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho vasettham upasakam bhagava etadavoca:
an8.44:2.1: Evam vutte, vasettho upasako bhagavantam etadavoca:
an8.44:2.2: “piya me, bhante, natisalohita atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavaseyyum, piyanampi me assa natisalohitanam digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
an8.44:2.3: Sabbe cepi, bhante, khattiya atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavaseyyum, sabbesampissa khattiyanam digharattam hitaya sukhaya. Sabbe cepi, bhante, brahmana …pe… vessa … sudda atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavaseyyum, sabbesampissa suddanam digharattam hitaya sukhaya”ti.
an8.44:3.2: Sabbe cepi, vasettha, khattiya atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavaseyyum, sabbesampissa khattiyanam digharattam hitaya sukhaya. Sabbe cepi, vasettha, brahmana …pe… vessa … sudda atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavaseyyum, sabbesampissa suddanam digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
an8.44:3.3: Sadevako cepi, vasettha, loko samarako sabrahmako sassamanabrahmani paja sadevamanussa atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavaseyyum, sadevakassapissa lokassa samarakassa sabrahmakassa sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
an8.44:3.4: Ime cepi, vasettha, mahasala atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavaseyyum, imesampissa mahasalanam digharattam hitaya sukhaya (…).
